fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Belittle (Night): Belittle someone. Based on their subalignment, their ability will be nerfed for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Investigative roles will receive false feedback based on their ability (their results will be framed or randomized if they are unaffected by frames)
- Protective roles will have their ability fail if their target is visited by a non-killing role.
- Killing roles will have their Attack value decreased to the next-lowest value.
- Support roles will have their visit fail regardless of any other abilities used on them.
- Any subalignment not listed will not receive a nerf.
- You will be notified if your belittlement impacted your target's actions.
- Your target will not be notified about their belittlement.
- You may not belittle an Unseen member.
